price: 16. « Notre Seigneur Sait que c’est vers vous que nous sommes certes envoyés, (dirent les Messagers)
arabic: قَالُواْ رَبُّنَا يَعۡلَمُ إِنَّآ إِلَيۡكُمۡ لَمُرۡسَلُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: qālū rabbunā yaʿlamu innā ilaykum lamur'salūna
